actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description: Polymorphs into a Small or Medium female humanoid or back; stats unchanged; equipment unchanged; reverts on death.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.description: With a heartstone, enters Ethereal Plane from Material Plane or vice versa.

actions.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day)
actions.description: While on Ethereal Plane, touches a sleeping humanoid on Material Plane; if contact persists 1 hour the target gains no rest benefits and max HP is reduced by 5 (1d10). Reduction lasts until greater restoration or similar; if reduced to 0 the target dies and evil souls are trapped in the hag's soul bag. Protection from evil and good or magic circle prevent contact.
